code: import React from"react";import GoogleSignin from"../img/btn_google_signin_dark_pressed_web.png";import{auth}from"../firebase";import{GoogleAuthProvider,signInWithRedirect}from"firebase/auth";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Welcome=function Welcome(){var googleSignIn=function googleSignIn(){var provider=new GoogleAuthProvider();signInWithRedirect(auth,provider);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"welcome",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Welcome to React Chat."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/logo512.png",alt:"ReactJs logo",width:50,height:50}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Sign in with Google to chat with with your fellow React Developers."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"sign-in",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{onClick:googleSignIn,src:GoogleSignin,alt:"sign in with google",type:"button"})})]});};export default Welcome;
